Ingredient: 3lbs Chicken Thighs (with bone in) // 7 Oz Paneer Packet // 1 Cup Water // 1 Cup Crushed Tomatoes // 1/2 Cup Heavy Whipping Cream // 4 Tbsp. Butter // 1 Tbsp. Olive Oil // 2 tsp. Coconut Oil // 1 1/2 tsp. Garlic Paste // 1 1/2 tsp. Ginger Paste // 1 tsp. Coriander Powder // 1 tsp. Garam Masala // 1 tsp. Salt // 1 tsp. Freshly Ground Black Pepper // 1/2 tsp. Paprika // 1/2 tsp. Kashmiri Mirch // 1/2 tsp. Red Chili Powder // 5 Sprigs Cilantro

Title: Beanless Low Carb Chili Con Carne
Ingredient: 1 lb Ground Beef // 1 lb Hot Italian Sausage // 1 Large Green Pepper // 1 Large Yellow Pepper // 1 Medium White Onion // 1 Can Tomato Sauce (Rao’s is very low carb) // 2 Tbsp. Curry Powder // 2 Tbsp. Chili Powder // 2 Tbsp. Cumin // 1 Tbsp. Minced Garlic // 1 Tbsp. Organic Coconut Oil // 1 Tbsp. Butter // 1 tsp. Onion Powder // 1 tsp. Salt // 1 tsp. Freshly Gound Black Pepper

Title: Asian Inspired Keto Pork Chops
Ingredient: 4 boneless pork chops // 1 medium star anise // 1 stalk lemongrass, peeled and diced // 4 cloves garlic, halved // 1 Tbsp. fish sauce // 1 Tbsp. almond flour // 1/2 Tbsp. sugar free ketchup // 1/2 Tbsp. sambal chili paste // 1 1/2 tsp. soy sauce // 1 tsp. sesame oil // 1/2 tsp. five spice // 1/2 tsp. peppercorns

Title: Guilt Free Portobello Bun Burgers
Ingredient: 2 Portobello Mushroom Caps // 1/2 Tbsp. Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil // 1 clove Garlic, minced // 1 Tsp. Oregano // Pinch Salt // Pinch Freshly Ground Black Pepper

Title: Easiest Keto Meatza You’ll Ever Make!
Ingredient: 12 Oz Can Chicken Breast // 1/4c Parmesan Cheese // 1c Mozerella Cheese // 3/4c Low Carb Tomato Sauce // 1 Large Egg // 1/2 Tbsp. Oregano // 1 tsp. Thyme // 1 tsp. Rosemary // 1 tsp. Basil // 1 tsp. Garlic // 1 tsp. Pepper

Title: Thin Crust Low Carb Pizza
Ingredient: Joseph’s Low-Carb Pita Bread (Choose desired quantity and size) // Tomato Sauce (My favorite is Rao’s – lots of flavors) – Few tablespoons, enough to cover pita. // Cheese (Low-moisture mozzerella is a great base, then add others of your choosing) 2 ounces per pita // Ground Black Pepper – dash // Garlic Powder (optional) – dash // Chili Flakes (optional) – dash
